import '../styles/postcard.css' import { useAudioContext } from '../contexts/AudioContext' import { useEffect } from 'react' export default function PostMusicCard({ card, setMusicPlayer }) { const { _id, name, author, file, albumCover, albumId } = card const domain = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_SERVICE}/musics/${albumId}` const audioContext = useAudioContext(); function playAudio() { audioContext.setSongById(_id); setMusicPlayer(_id); } return (
{ (albumCover !== "") ?
:
}

{name}

{author}

favorite 0
0
download
) }
